name: Cheerful Recoil
description:
Walking is for loosers and recoil exists for a reason.

Master 3 types of weapons and shoot/parkour your way to victory!

1. Shotgun - slow but hard hitting, good for getting speed quickly

2. Machine gun - fast and delicate, good for corrections and picking up the speed once you have some

3. Big gun - big, reliable for all purposes

Also Billy...

Controls:

Mouse - aiming and shooting (LPM)

1,2,3 - switching weapons

Gameplay and what not - Jan Dzięgiel

Special thanks to Filip Sojma for terrain and UI art.

Maple Leaf Rag by Kevin MacLeod Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5762-maple-leaf-rag License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
